title: Gameday without Saban?
description:
Jason Fitz, Jim Mora, and Desmond Howard preview week 7 in college football. Tom Rinaldi joins the show to give us the latest news on Nick Saban, and the crew discuss if they believe North Carolina is a real playoff contender.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: CFB Live: The CFB Live Crew previews tomorrow's slate of games.
